name: made-in-america-data
description: # Description - This repository contains a script, 'buildwaiverdata.js' that pulls the public field information from the Forms.gov API for MIA, and writes it to a JSON file 'waivers-data.json', as well as a secondary 'buildcsvdata.js' script which converts the data in the 'waivers-data.json' file into a CSV file 'waiverscsv.csv'. The angular website code from the madeinamerica.gov site pulls information from the 'waivers-data.json' on demand.
